content: दशार्ण <ab>N.</ab> of a country, through which flows the Daśārṇā (Dasan). It was the eastern part of Mālava or Mālvā, its capital being Vidiśā--the modern Bhilsā--situated on the Vetravatī or Betva, <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Me. 24</ls>, <ls n="Me.">25</ls> and Kādambarī. Kālidāsa also makes Vidiśā a river which is probably the same as the Bees that joins the Betva.
